description:
Arriving at the Beastmen continent, Setsu and Levia meet Shironeko, a fierce fighter. When Shironeko is asked to assassinate Setsu, she agrees for the sake of her ill sister. All is not what it seems, though, and Setsu uncovers a tangled web of deceit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sur le continent bestial pour la deuxième fois
Visiting the Beastmen Continent for a Second Time
獣人大陸は二度目です
